channel.title: NRS3server V3 production
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2cijon7.png[/img]
we have started out our newest version and I would only like for those who are willing to do intense programming with me to sign up for this project this will be my very last release before I leave rsps for a while.
This project will be the continuation of the full version of the Released NRS3server v2 beta I will be looking forward to working with those reliable enough to contribute.
[size=12pt]Here are the features[/size] - Grand Exchange (buying only if you fix sell just let me know) - All Auras - Flaming skulls - Polypore Dungeon - Dungeoneering 100% - 1 npc for all weapons and armours - all pets - Dragonbone - Flaming Skulls - 725 cache - Anti lagg system - vote4cash - much more etc..
[size=12pt][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size] - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP - Auras are all complete except for Salvation and Corruption bonuses work wings are glitched
(Bosses) - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More...
Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Random Stuff: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - custom maps - donorzones staffzones and more
Armours/Bosses: - All new 721 armours obv we all know - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now - Quests are partially made
[b]Polypore Dungeon[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/30j4v0p.png[/img] [b]Grand Exchange[/b] There is no red green or yellow colors the action is instant so there is no waiting time until i get more players then i will base it more on eco [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/j12h40.png[/img] [b]Dungeoneering[/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/3133e2t.png[/img] [b]Queen Black Dragon[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/4rpc42.png[/img] [b]Flaming Skulls (this picture everyone loves to see so i put in for fun)[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2q01xnc.png[/img] [b]Emotes for loyalty points[/b] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/huj5sg.png[/img]
Please remember the picture i have shown above are not exactly what is on the v3 but the v3 is far more advanced than what you see atm
Use the following format to apply [code] Name: Age: Skype: Server Coder/Client Coder/Graphics Designer/Beta Tester/: (choose one please) Have you worked on V2 BETA: (If the answer to the above is yes and you have choosen server sided programmer what have you done): Years of Experience: Proof of work (your name must be seen in the credits): [/code]
[/center]

item.title: NRS3server V3 production
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

[center]

2cijon7.png900×234

we have started out our newest version and I would only like for those who are willing to do intense programming with me to sign up for this project this will be my very last release before I leave rsps for a while.

This project will be the continuation of the full version of the Released NRS3server v2 beta I will be looking forward to working with those reliable enough to contribute.

[size=12pt]Here are the features[/size]

  • Grand Exchange (buying only if you fix sell just let me know)
  • All Auras
  • Flaming skulls
  • Polypore Dungeon
  • Dungeoneering 100%
  • 1 npc for all weapons and armours
  • all pets
  • Dragonbone
  • Flaming Skulls
  • 725 cache
  • Anti lagg system
  • vote4cash
  • much more etc…

[size=12pt]Features:[/size]

  • Switching is near perfect
  • All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars
  • Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more.
  • Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP
  • Auras are all complete except for Salvation and Corruption bonuses work wings are glitched

(Bosses)

  • King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects
  • Tormented Demons with all 3 switches
  • Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless)
  • Godwars
  • Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks
  • Frost dragons
  • Dominion Tower
  • Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More…

Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat

  • Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless
  • Switching better than RS
  • Full Summoning!!
  • Armour set effects all added!
  • Degrading Pvp Armours
  • Storm Of Armadyl Spell
  • Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)

Random Stuff:

  • All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons!
  • Quick Chat 100%
  • music everyone knows that
  • custom maps
  • donorzones staffzones and more

Armours/Bosses:

  • All new 721 armours obv we all know
  • Bosses are upgraded to new looks
  • Jad waves maxed out to 65
  • Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats
  • Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now
  • Quests are partially made

Polypore Dungeon

30j4v0p.png1324×498

Grand Exchange
There is no red green or yellow colors the action is instant so there is no waiting time until i get more players then i will base it more on eco
j12h40.png761×501

Dungeoneering
3133e2t.png1316×515

Queen Black Dragon
4rpc42.png1329×653

Flaming Skulls (this picture everyone loves to see so i put in for fun)

Emotes for loyalty points
huj5sg.png1023×446

Please remember the picture i have shown above are not exactly what is on the v3 but the v3 is far more advanced than what you see atm

Use the following format to apply

Name:
Age:
Skype:
Server Coder/Client Coder/Graphics Designer/Beta Tester/: (choose one please)
Have you worked on V2 BETA:
(If the answer to the above is yes and you have choosen server sided programmer what have you done):
Years of Experience:
Proof of work (your name must be seen in the credits):

[/center]

Read full topic
